Reviews.Title: Bad Experience
Reviews.Author: Allison Deane
Reviews.Content: Purchased one Origianl Blackberry Bold 9650 OEM Full Black Housing Cover with keypad for my Blackberry 9650.  Item arrived promptly but it did not fit my Blackberry since my phone has the track pad and the housing was for a phone which carries the roller ball.  Contacted the seller and was told that they did not sell Housing for Blackberry.  Emailed the seller the product number and received email saying that I did not have a Blackberry 9650.  No offer to exchange the item or to return my money.  Would not purchase anything from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: damaged product
Reviews.Author: edgar borjas
Reviews.Content: good morning.I am disappointed to inform you of this serviceThis product looked goodwhen I checked it, I realized that this damagedThe housing has a broken wireso my phone can not work wellEdgar Borjas

Reviews.Title: Original BlackBerry Bold 9650 OEM completa tapa de la carcasa Negro + Teclado
Reviews.Author: gregory salas "gregory salas"
Reviews.Content: I have a blackberry 9650 which was badly damaged by the passage of time and use it daily and spor I decided to buy the BlackBerry Bold 9650 OEM Original Full Housing Cover Black + Keypad and ready my bb look like new.

Reviews.Title: good!!!
Reviews.Author: Luis G.
Reviews.Content: this allowed me to completely fix my blackberry device and practically have one as new and can sell at a good price

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Yanira Parra
Reviews.Content: is of excellent quality, it has a great price, exactly what I expected, I recommend it, do not repent, excellent relation price.

Reviews.Title: good item
Reviews.Author: samuel
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this to everyone that's looking for a bold 9650 housingthis is a very high quality item, i will buy againThanks you seller you made my day.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Terry-Ann Wallac
Reviews.Content: This product was exact and got to me in quick time. This housing made my phone looked brand new. Very satisfied with the product.

Reviews.Title: new
Reviews.Author: Belkis
Reviews.Content: good parts, all fit to perfection, I am like my old phone again, good care, good service, good delivery, I have no complaints about this purchase

Reviews.Title: can't rate a product without a comment, so
Reviews.Author: Jrod
Reviews.Content: can't rate a product without a comment, so here is my comment.  Totally awesome, awesomeness, with a side of awesome

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: SANDRO SIRONI
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, high quality ... My cell phone has been running like new and without any kind of problem.The material that is produced is quite sturdy once installed remained an OEM cell.Electronic connectors match perfectly

Reviews.Title: Unusable
Reviews.Author: Debra Richardson
Reviews.Content: According to Sprint this item can not be used for the reason that I purchased it for. I wish I had known this prior to buying.

Reviews.Author: vanessa bonacia
Reviews.Content: no es de tan buena calidad apenas la fui a colocar se partio una pieza sin ningun esfuerzo... y luego con el tiempo se le han ido partiendo mas piezas

Reviews.Title: fits great!
Reviews.Author: Freshtex
Reviews.Content: my daughter has a 9650 that got a little more falls than it bargained for, so i got this housing to spruce it up for her, man it fit well like the original, plus the damn phone just looks brand new, i also got this case, soft and smooth plus it fits perfect on the phone. Black Silicone Case / Skin / Cover for RIM BlackBerry Bold 9650 / Tour 9630

Reviews.Title: "chrome" bezel doesn't fit properly came to me damaged
Reviews.Author: this guy
Reviews.Content: Granted this is an inexpensive replacement for a damaged shell, but this is a tad rediculous. for one thing, the entire front "chrome" piece doesn't even fit.  And another problem is the main black piece showed up with damage!! and the "blackberry" text on the upper front panel is a cheap white color instead of the chrome letters that was on the original. very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Arquimedes Mota
Reviews.Content: I thought that replacing the housing of my Blackberry Bold 9650 would make it look like new and I was right. Replacing the full housing, cover, and keypad made my phone to look like a new one.

Reviews.Title: Good Housing!!
Reviews.Author: Bryant R
Reviews.Content: I like the housing a lot. One of the best things about it was the price of course and the fact that it didn't have any company name on it (which is good if you have an unlocked phone from another company)

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: David Vanegas
Reviews.Content: Excelent shipping service and product quality. Its the second time I ask for Blackberry Housing and both times I ve had a very good product.

ProductInfo.Name: Original BlackBerry Bold 9650 OEM Full Black Housing Cover + Keypad
